local_intent: Close the gripper on the green_bottle after moving to the computed grasp pose and verify grasp stability.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose returns a valid goal_pose for green_bottle.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT segment around CloseGripper: visibility fallback -> detection -> open -> compute side grasp (goal_pose) -> move to pose -> close with force 20 -> verify stability.
